answers.answer: I go next week for mine along with the rh factor test. Tho it runs in my family im pretty sure everyone gets it done. Im 25+2.

Actually I'm quite curious too I did have one done with my son nearly 6 years ago now & Im currently 16+6 & haven't had one done yet. Wonder when they usually do them might mention it to my Dr next app.
I know there done within 24-28 weeks but I just don't know if I'm gunna have to get it done or not since I didn't before
I heard that every one has to around 24-28 weeks to make sure you don't have gestational diabetes. But I could be wrong.
Usually everyone gets them, but you do have the option to opt out. You just have to sign papers saying that you decided against doing the test.
Ive had 2 done this pregnancy actually.. One in the beginnin at 9 weeks nd then the second one i was i believe 26 weeks or 25... Im 30w2d now.. I heard some people only gettin it done once..

If you already are diagnosed with either type 1 or 2 diabetes then they do not test during pregnancy. So no not everyone gets it. I have been pregnant twice and neither time had to do it because I am diabetic.

question: Okay ladies question is does everyone have to get a glucos test done? With my son I never had it done but that was over 6 years ago. I'm now 26+2 here in 3-4 minutes and have my dr app on Thursday and just wondering if ill have to get one done or not.
title: Glucos test??
